pages.privacy-policy: PortCasino Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Information PortCasino HOME Events Casino Contact Privacy Policy At PortCasino, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe online experience. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. 1. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide directly to us when you register for an account, participate in promotions, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and other personal details. We also collect information automatically through cookies and other tracking technologies, including your IP address, browser type, and browsing behavior. 2. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including personalizing your experience, processing transactions, and communicating with you. We may also use your information for marketing purposes, to send you updates about our games, promotions, and events, and to ensure compliance with legal requirements. 3. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted partners who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or serving you, provided they agree to keep your information confidential. We may also disclose your information as required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of others. 4. Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Despite these measures, no security system is impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information transmitted to us. 5. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website. Your continued use of our services constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy.
